thread.section_title: Naked man filmed crawling along high street on his hands and knees – Metro
thread.title: Naked man filmed crawling along high street on his hands and knees
thread.title_full: Naked man filmed crawling along high street on his hands and knees

author: Jimmy Nsubuga
title: Naked man filmed crawling along high street on his hands and knees
text:
He was spotted on Great Western Road, in Glasgow (Picture: Deadline News) A naked man has been filmed crawling on his hands and knees on a busy high street.
A video showed the unnamed man making his way down Great Western Road, in Glasgow, this morning.
Theresa May says we will 'never give in to terror' as she condemns 'sick' attack He had got out of a Vauxhall Vectra fully naked and then walked for a bit before dropping to his hands and knees.
The bizarre incident happened during rush hour and it stunned Twitter user Mark, who filmed the footage.
He wrote: ‘Going to work and some guy casually just standing naked in the middle of Great Western Road naked starts crawling along the road.’
MORE: Theresa May says we will ‘never give in to terror’ as she condemns ‘sick’ attack 
&&&&& To view this video please enable JavaScript, and consider upgrading to a web browser that supports HTML5 video 
Most social media users were concerned for the man.
One user wrote: ‘Poor guy needs help, not to be made fun of.’
Another added: ‘Obviously having a breakdown. Poor guy. Can happen to anyone.’
MORE: Schoolchildren sing to cheer up people locked inside Parliament during terror attack 
MORE: London terror attacker was ‘Asian man in his 40s’ in car registered to affluent area
